dialogue: A mysterious figure appears. What do you do?
They say: 'I am a guardian of balance.'

choices.name: Defeat the Wild Beast
choices.description: The wild beast has been terrorizing the nearby village. Defeat it in battle to protect the town!

choices.name: Collect 10 Herbs
choices.description: The village healer needs herbs to make potions. Collect 10 herbs from the forest.
